text: Nicole Kidman attends the 74th Annual Golden Globe Awards on January 8. ( Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ) Nicole Kidman offered a message not often heard from the Hollywood elite : Americans need to support President - elect Donald Trump. She was speaking with Victoria Derbyshire of BBC Two, promoting the based - on - a - true - story film “ Lion, ” which she described as a “ love letter … to mothers and children. ” In it, she portrays an Australian woman who, with her husband, adopts a lost Indian boy named Saroo. During the interview, Derbyshire brought up Kidman ’ s dual Australian and American citizenship and noted the actress voted in the U.
